page.title: 06MY HOUSE
page.content: Most of the houses in our area are cottages.Down School Lane the houses are made out of brick.The roofs are made out of tiles.They are called council houses and were built after 1945.In Elsthorpe,every house is a cottage and some have thatched roofs.Thatched roofs are made out of a special straw.In Grimsthorpe,about 85% of houses are old but made out of brick.The remainder are stone.Our school is built of stone and the roof is made of Collyweston slate.Some houses were built over a hundred years ago.All houses have fireplaces. We can see the chimneys.Water and electricity go to every house except to an old lady of 87.She uses an oil lamp for lighting and cooks on an open fire.Her kettle sits on the hob.She is happy to live like this.She does not want to change.
